metadata.title: CVE-2023-43907 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
OptiPNG v0.7.7 was discovered to contain a global buffer overflow via the'buffer' variable at gifread.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-43907` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

optipng - 0.7.8+ds-1build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: optipng package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.8+ds-1build2').
